query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and her iconic rendition of 'I Will Always Love You' influence the landscape of pop and R&B music?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to constantly reinvent his musical style and persona impact the evolution of rock music and the broader cultural scene?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting contribute to Queen's status as one of the most influential rock bands in history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal technique, shaped contemporary music trends and influenced a new generation of artists?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message of peace and unity resonate globally, helping to popularize reggae music and the Rastafarian movement?
